description:
Two gentleman guests come to The Upper Floor to be entertained. House slaves ash, kaos, and katt are on call, and use their lovely bodies and good manners to provide service. The girls lick shoes clean and masturbate for the pleasure of their guests.
Unfortunately, ash forgets that as a personal slave for The Pope, she is barred from touching cock to show her devotion to The House and The Pope. Her greedy hand reaches out to grab for The Steward and she is quickly reprimanded and made to watch katt and kaos gorge themselves on dick while she sits on her hands and suffers.
title: Service Day: No Cock for ash
